item.title: Plexus Codehaus: Plexus Interpolation Version 1.25 Released
item.description: The Codehaus Plexus team is pleased to announce the release of the Plexus Interpolation Version 1.25 Plexus interpolator is the outgrowth of multiple iterations of development focused on providing a more modular, flexible interpolation framework for the expression language style commonly seen in Maven, Plexus, and other related projects. It has its foundation in the org.codehaus.plexus.utils.interpolation package within plexus-utils, but has been separated in order to allow these two libraries to vary independently of one another.
